```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}

justicesdata <- read_xlsx("justicesdemdata/justicesdata.xlsx")


justicesdata %>% 
  count(nomrelig) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(nomrelig, -n), y = n, fill = nomrelig)) +
      geom_col()

```
